sentences.en: A no - leakage quick loading adapter pertains to the art of liquid delivery.
sentences.cn: 一种无泄漏快速装车接头,属于流体输送领域.

sentences.en: An adapter allows the card to plug into any multimedia card slot.
sentences.cn: 而配合一块适配器可以使它插入任何多媒体插槽.

sentences.en: Another thing is venturi'adapter ', see picture 18.
sentences.cn: 另一件事是文丘里'适配器 ', 看到图片18.

sentences.en: Check modules are threaded into the valve adapter for leak proof operation.
sentences.cn: 止回阀模块通过螺纹旋进阀门适配器内,提供无泄漏运行.

sentences.en: Fiber adapter includes ST, SC, FC, LC, a variety single, multi - adapter.
sentences.cn: 光纤适配器类包括ST 、 SC 、 FC 、 LC 、 各种规格单 、 多模 适配器.

sentences.en: Involve , Directional Coupler , Shortplug, Adapter , Four Stabs Tune, Transformer etc.
sentences.cn: 包括定向合器,波导段, 变压器, 短路器, 波导转换器, 调配器等.

sentences.en: Make sure your network cable is properly attached to your network adapter.
sentences.cn: 确保网络电缆正确连接网络适配器.

sentences.en: Note that the resource adapter should not block in this method.
sentences.cn: 注意，资源适配器不应当阻塞在这个方法中。

sentences.en: PC is connected with LonWorks networks by a LonTalk protocol adapter.
sentences.cn: 一块LonTalk协议适配卡将PC机与LonWorks网络相联.

sentences.en: Place the tester adapter over the opening.
sentences.cn: 把试验器连接装置放在加油口上.

sentences.en: Plug in the AC adapter and restart your notebook.
sentences.cn: 插入交流电适配器并重新启动笔记本电脑.

sentences.en: Power and charge all your devices with a universal power adapter!
sentences.cn: 电力和电荷所有设备通用电源适配器!

sentences.en: Secondly, ARM 7 core based embedded instrument network adapter system hardware is designed.
sentences.cn: 其次, 设计了基于ARM7内核的嵌入式仪器网络适配系统硬件.

sentences.en: The adapter bushing and key may be different from illustration shown.
sentences.cn: 适配器衬套和销键可能与图示不同.

sentences.en: The resource adapter will install on the server after you do that.
sentences.cn: 当您做了之后，资源适配器将安装在服务器上。

sentences.en: The top adapter is secured from the top using three M 5 screws.
sentences.cn: 顶部适配器从顶部用3颗M5螺丝加固.

sentences.en: This section shows you how to remove an adapter.
sentences.cn: 这一部分向您展示了如何删除适配器。

sentences.en: What data should the data adapter load into the dataset?
sentences.cn: 数据适配器应将哪些数据加载到数据集中?

words.tran_cn: 适合的；能适应的；可修改的
适应；改编；改编本，改写本
[通信] 适配器；（美）改编者；转接器（等于adapter）
[通信]适配器；改编者；[电子][机][冶]接合器；适应者

phrases.tran_cn: 交流电转接器，交流整流器
图形适配器（显示卡的另一种名称）；图形介面卡

trans.tran_cn: 适配器，改编者，适应者，适应物
trans.tran_en: an object that you use to connect two different pieces of electrical equipment, or to connect two pieces of equipment to the same power supply
